20110106220813.000|20110106220816.000|TR0|BLITZER:  It took a series of lawmakers 84 
20110106220816.000|20110106220818.000|TR0|minutes to read the entire Constitution.  
20110106220818.000|20110106220820.000|TR0|The minority leader, Nancy Pelosi, and 
20110106220820.000|20110106220823.000|TR0|some other Democrats joined in.  
20110106220823.000|20110106220825.000|TR0|Republicans billed the reading as long 
20110106220825.000|20110106220827.000|TR0|overdue tribute to America's founding 
20110106220827.000|20110106220830.000|TR0|principles.  Critics, however, dismissed 
20110106220830.000|20110106220832.000|TR0|it as nothing more than a political stunt 
20110106220832.000|20110106220834.000|TR0|by the new GOP leadership.
20110106220834.000|20110106220837.000|TR0|
20110106220837.000|20110106220839.000|TR0|Over at the White House today, President 
20110106220839.000|20110106220841.000|TR0|Obama officially broke the news he tapped 
20110106220841.000|20110106220843.000|TR0|former Commerce secretary Bill Daley to 
20110106220843.000|20110106220846.000|TR0|become his next chief of staff.  Daley has 
20110106220846.000|20110106220848.000|TR0|a unique resume as an investment banking 
20110106220848.000|20110106220850.000|TR0|executive, now a former member of the 
20110106220850.000|20110106220853.000|TR0|Clinton cabinet and as part of Chicago's 
20110106220853.000|20110106220855.000|TR0|famous political dynasty.

20110106220902.000|20110106220904.000|TR0|BARACK OBAMA, PRESIDENT OF THE UNITED 
20110106220904.000|20110106220907.000|TR0|STATES:  Few Americans can boast the 
20110106220907.000|20110106220909.000|TR0|breadth of experience that Bill brings to 
20110106220909.000|20110106220911.000|TR0|this job.  He served as a member of 
20110106220911.000|20110106220914.000|TR0|President Clinton's cabinet as Commerce 
20110106220914.000|20110106220916.000|TR0|secretary.  He took on several other 
20110106220916.000|20110106220918.000|TR0|important duties over the years on behalf 
20110106220918.000|20110106220921.000|TR0|of our country.  He has led major 
20110106220921.000|20110106220923.000|TR0|corporations.  He possesses a deep

20110106220925.000|20110106220928.000|TR0|how to grow our economy.  And needless to

20110106221017.000|20110106221019.000|TR0|happening right now.  A former CIA officer 
20110106221019.000|20110106221021.000|TR0|in court in St. Louis today on charges he 
20110106221021.000|20110106221024.000|TR0|disclosed secret Defense information.  Our 
20110106221024.000|20110106221026.000|TR0|homeland security correspondent, Jeanne 
20110106221026.000|20110106221028.000|TR0|Meserve, is standing by here with details.
20110106221028.000|20110106221031.000|TR0|
20110106221031.000|20110106221033.000|TR0|What is going on here, Jeanne?
20110106221033.000|20110106221035.000|TR0|
20110106221035.000|20110106221038.000|TR0|JEANNE MESERVE, CNN HOMELAND SECURITY 
20110106221038.000|20110106221040.000|TR0|CORRESPONDENT:  Wolf, his name is Jeffrey 
20110106221040.000|20110106221042.000|TR0|Sterling, 43 years old, a former CIA 
20110106221042.000|20110106221045.000|TR0|officer.  He was arrested today and 
20110106221045.000|20110106221047.000|TR0|charged with leaking classified 
20110106221047.000|20110106221049.000|TR0|information to a journalist.  The 
20110106221049.000|20110106221052.000|TR0|information is described in the indictment 
20110106221052.000|20110106221054.000|TR0|as relating to a secret program designed 
20110106221054.000|20110106221056.000|TR0|to impede the weapons capability of an 
20110106221056.000|20110106221059.000|TR0|unnamed nation and a human asset assisting 
20110106221059.000|20110106221101.000|TR0|that program.
20110106221101.000|20110106221103.000|TR0|
20110106221103.000|20110106221106.000|TR0|The journalist is identified only as 
20110106221106.000|20110106221108.000|TR0|"Author A" in the indictment, but there is 
20110106221108.000|20110106221110.000|TR0|every indication it is James Risen of "The 
20110106221110.000|20110106221113.000|TR0|New York Times" who wrote the 2006 book 
20110106221113.000|20110106221115.000|TR0|"State of War: The Secret History of the 
20110106221115.000|20110106221117.000|TR0|CIA" which discussed a CIA operation which 
20110106221117.000|20110106221120.000|TR0|used a Russian scientist to try to setback 
20110106221120.000|20110106221122.000|TR0|Iranian nuclear development.
20110106221122.000|20110106221124.000|TR0|
20110106221124.000|20110106221127.000|TR0|Sterling was fired by the CIA in 2002.  
20110106221127.000|20110106221129.000|TR0|The indictment says his anger and 
20110106221129.000|20110106221131.000|TR0|resentment toward the CIA grew over time.  
20110106221131.000|20110106221133.000|TR0|He sued the agency for racial 
20110106221133.000|20110106221136.000|TR0|discrimination before and after his 
20110106221136.000|20110106221138.000|TR0|firing.  He also clashed with the agency's 
20110106221138.000|20110106221140.000|TR0|publication review board over his memoirs. 
20110106221140.000|20110106221143.000|TR0|      The indictment quotes verbatim from 
20110106221143.000|20110106221145.000|TR0|conversations and e-mails between Sterling 
20110106221145.000|20110106221147.000|TR0|and "Author A."  An attorney for James 
20110106221147.000|20110106221150.000|TR0|Risen would not comment on whether with 
20110106221150.000|20110106221152.000|TR0|Sterling was one of Risen's confidential 
20110106221152.000|20110106221154.000|TR0|sources and says Risen has not provided 
20110106221154.000|20110106221157.000|TR0|testimony or documentation or cooperated 
20110106221157.000|20110106221159.000|TR0|in any way with the government's 
20110106221159.000|20110106221201.000|TR0|investigations into sources for his book.
20110106221201.000|20110106221204.000|TR0|
20110106221204.000|20110106221206.000|TR0|Sterling, meanwhile, has been working in 
20110106221206.000|20110106221208.000|TR0|St. Louis as an insurance adjustor.  
20110106221208.000|20110106221211.000|TR0|According to our affiliate KMOV, he made 
20110106221211.000|20110106221213.000|TR0|his initial court appearance today in leg 
20110106221213.000|20110106221215.000|TR0|shackles and he will remain in jail 
20110106221215.000|20110106221218.000|TR0|because the court judged him to be a 
20110106221218.000|20110106221220.000|TR0|flight risk -- Wolf.

20110106222059.000|20110106222102.000|TR0|hours later, they did allow people to come 
20110106222102.000|20110106222104.000|TR0|back in when they deemed the building to 
20110106222104.000|20110106222106.000|TR0|be safe and the incident was apparently 
20110106222106.000|20110106222109.000|TR0|contained.
20110106222109.000|20110106222111.000|TR0|

20110106222113.000|20110106222116.000|TR0|legislator here not too long ago and he 
20110106222116.000|20110106222118.000|TR0|said the timing is interesting because 
20110106222118.000|20110106222120.000|TR0|there aren't that many people in these 
20110106222120.000|20110106222123.000|TR0|buildings right now, but a week from now

20110106224227.000|20110106224230.000|TR0|think it's a good precedent to start.
20110106224230.000|20110106224232.000|TR0|
20110106224232.000|20110106224234.000|TR0|I don't think there is anything wrong 
20110106224234.000|20110106224237.000|TR0|with, once every two years, spending an 
20110106224237.000|20110106224239.000|TR0|hour and a half of reading the 
20110106224239.000|20110106224241.000|TR0|Constitution.  They did things like had

20110106225614.000|20110106225616.000|TR0|of those Christians are fleeing.  In fact, 
20110106225616.000|20110106225619.000|TR0|in Iraq, for example, only four percent of

20110106225733.000|20110106225735.000|TR0|In the Egypt attack, and in an October 
20110106225735.000|20110106225738.000|TR0|attack on a Caldeon (ph) Catholic church
